title: Offensive Sell Signals For Active Investors
description: Good traders know how to cut their losses before a bad trade turns into a big mistake. But knowing when to take profits? Well, that can separate a good trader from a great one. IBD's Alissa Coram and Scott St. Clair discuss key offensive sell rules.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Good traders know how to cut their losses before a bad trade turns into a big mistake. But knowing when to take profits? Well, that can separate a good trader from a great one. IBD's Alissa Coram and Scott St. Clair discuss key offensive sell rules.
